    Subclasses of Action in game 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    class  BuyFromShopAction
    Action that allows player to buy from the shop.
    class  CraftWeaponAction
    An action that craft a new weapon from a CraftableWeaponItem object
    class  CraftWeaponAtShopAction
    A children class of the CraftWeaponAction.
    class  DropDefreezeItemAction  
    class  EatingHealAction
    Heal after Eating Action for Actors
    class  EndingGameAction
    An action for quit game
    class  FertilizeAction
    Fertilize Action for Actor to fertilize Crops.
    class  HarvestingAction
    Harvesting Action for Actor to harvest ripen crops
    class  PickFreezeItemAction  
    class  PlayerEatingAction
    Eating Action specifically for Player
    class  SellToShopAction
    An action to allow Player to sell its items.
    class  SowCropAction
    Action for Sowing a Crop
    class  ZombieAttackAction
    An attack action class for the Zombie.

    Returns an FertilizeAction that fertilize a crop crop is able to be fertilize if it is a Crops object with the displayChar of 'c'
    Action FollowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
    Action HarvestingBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns an HarvestingAction that harvest a ripen crop Owner of this Behaviour is able to harvest a ripen crop when standing next to it or on it.
    Action HuntBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  
    Action SowCropBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns an SowCropAction that sow a crop at the patch of dirt next to Actor Crops is able to be sow only on a patch of dirt and it only has 33% probability of sowing
    Action WanderBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
